channel.title: I need some info
channel.description: Alright guys, I'm rebuilding RuneScape (from scratch) actully I planned this a long time ago but the only problem is, I have no clue on how to get the RuneScape MAP, I'm not planning to model it bymyself because I'm a one man's team so yeah. I need as much information about the RuneScape map as possible. For example, where it is located and such and what format. Thank you.

item.title: I need some info
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:6, topic:357839”]it’s not just 1 file. you have map data, models, animations, object data, and more![/quote]nvm, i found a way, i just edited the pov and i found an easy way to add materials to the models

Read full topic

item.title: I need some info

item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

it’s not just 1 file. you have map data, models, animations, object data, and more!

item.title: I need some info
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:4, topic:357839”][quote author=MistaBigBoss link=topic=454350.msg3327108#msg3327108 date=1283194379]

here lol

http://www.google.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/tutorials/242975-how-capture-sprites-textures-geometry-shaders-runescape.html
[/quote]i found tht trick out myself but unfortunally that’s WAY to messy, missing textures, the whole fucking thing is like how can i describe this, bent over, really no way to explain it just saying that its messy i need antoerh way

then srry i cant help u :([/quote]np, thx for trying
